column4: hi, im trying to install phpize via 'apt-get install php5-dev', and i get an error saying linux-libc-dev could not be found (i get a 404 not found from security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/lucid-updates/main), any ideas whats wrong?
where do you install this php5-dev from?
i dunno, apt-get php5-dev .... apparently i needed to run apt-get update first, now its ok
apt-cache policy <package> shows you were from something gets installed
